job_title: Senior Youth Counselor in Calgary, AB
pros: Management listens to employees and will even work front line

job_title: Child and Youth Worker in Calgary, AB
cons: Unsupportive management (not all), underpaid, job expectations far over reach the pay, understaffed, not allowed to disagree, feelings ignored, dangerous environment with limited staff

pros: Good work culture and great staff.

pros: Transit accessible with Ctrain if you drive, there is parking close by.

job_title: Family Support Worker in Calgary, AB

review_title: Ethics not in line with who they say they are
job_title: Alternate Teaching Parent in Calgary, AB

review_title: Avoid if you have other options
job_title: Alternate Teaching Parent in Calgary, AB
pros: None, the motive behind the company is noble, the company however treats its people like sh!t.
cons: They dont care about their staff. Talk all the talk but dont give a hoot about you.

review_title: Not a great place to work
pros:
- benefits
- unlimited sick days
- training opportunities
- all salary positions except for relief staff
cons:
- toxic workplace
- make staff work overtime 
- on-call staff work their 40 hour work week and work long hours with minimal sleep providing on-call support
- management overwork their staff
- management is manipulative and not trauma-informed

pros: Friendly staff, flexibility, treated as a person, not just another employee. Continuous training.

review_title: Stay away!!! Unfair treatment and backstabbing. Unprofessional!
If you want to be assaulted, undermined, and unappreciated, apply here!
job_title: Youth Counselor/Group Home Worker in Calgary, AB
pros: provide NVCI training in first week of employment.
cons: I was assaulted twice within 3 months and the company refused to implement consequences for the youth, notify case workers, or police. They enable these youth to put their hands on staff by refusing to make the youth accountable and responsible for their actions. In 10 years of social service work, this is the only agency that has ever had clients become physical with me. I refuse to enable destructive, harmful behaviour, that perpetuates dysfunction rather than healing and growth.
